content: color & shape crocheted blanket design sings© finished blanket reads then sings my soul pattern and instructions only finished size is approximately 53 x 68 mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd eeeeaaaassssyyyy ttttoooo ssssttttiiiittttcccchhhh plymouth encore yarn only three types of stitches are used 6 - sand 5 - taupe to complete this pattern the chain 5 - green gremlin 4 - white stitch the single_crochet stitch and the popcorn size k 6 50 mm crochet hook scissors for personal use only - purchased via website distribution of this pattern electronically or in hardcopy form is prohibited by copyright laws color & shape crocheted blanket design sings© bbbbeeeeffffoooorrrreeee yyyyoooouuuu bbbbeeeeggggiiiinnnn materials abbreviations needed cc = change yarn color this blanket uses a number of different design pieces crochet each piece and then lay out the pieces as shown at the end of these instructions chain = chain stitch plymouth encore yarn 6 - sand 1202 the popcorn ps is made by placing 4 single crochets into the same single_crochet = single_crochet 5 - taupe 240 stitch remove your crochet hook from the fourth stitch leaving a loop place stitch 5 - green gremlin 451 the hook in the first of the four single crochets by inserting the hook from the 4 - white 208 back to the front grab loop from fourth single_crochet and pull through the skip = skip stitch popcorn should be on the back side of the piece as you are stitching if the size k crochet hook popcorn is joined so it faces you the words will be backwards ps = popcorn scissors after row 1 the chain stitch at the end of each row is used only to advance to st s = stitch es yardage 3 589 total the next row each row begins in the 3rd stitch from your hook - - chain sand - 1 140 stitch is #1 last single_crochet in previous row is #2 and becomes the turning x = the number of taupe - 886 stitch and is skipped the next single_crochet stitch is where the first stitch for times the stitch should green gremlin - 940 the new row is placed be repeated ex single_crochet x5 white - 624 = single_crochet in the you can view a youtube video tutorial at next 5 stitches https //www youtube com/watch v=arvtts6r9ji a second youtube video showing how to change yarn color is available at gauge 12 stitches https //youtu be/k1lmd1zvd1o equal 4 inches 14 row equal 4 inches if additional help is needed we also recommend the crochet crowd how to change colors at bigger or smaller https //www youtube com/watch v=dlfzytjm71o doesn t matter much for a blanket a chart of the design is also included use the written instructions for starting each piece so your stitch count is correct if you feel the stitch count is wrong in the written instructions count the stitches using the chart enjoy square - make 9 row 1 using white chain chain 41 single_crochet single_crochet row
